description: machine learning testbed for fun and profit
README.md:
MLCoalition
===========

machine learning testbed for fun and profit!

some links:
1. Cosma Shalizi's book: http://www.stat.cmu.edu/~cshalizi/ADAfaEPoV/. Also, his data mining notes: http://www.stat.cmu.edu/~cshalizi/350/,
2. Brad Efron's book, many biology examples: http://www.amazon.com/Large-Scale-Inference-Estimation-Prediction-Mathematical/dp/110761967X
3. Christian Robert: https://www.ceremade.dauphine.fr/~xian/books.html
4. Chatterjee on justifying LASSO: http://arxiv.org/abs/1303.5817, and matrix completion: http://arxiv.org/abs/1212.1247
5. Deep learning: http://deeplearning.net/reading-list/comment-page-1/
6. More on DL: http://web.eecs.utk.edu/~itamar/Papers/DML_Arel_2010.pdf
7. Another one: http://www.iro.umontreal.ca/~bengioy/papers/ftml.pdf

possible competitions:
1. http://www.kaggle.com/c/battlefin-s-big-data-combine-forecasting-challenge
2. http://www.kaggle.com/c/expedia-personalized-sort
3. http://www.kaggle.com/c/stumbleupon
4. http://www.kaggle.com/c/belkin-energy-disaggregation-competition
5. http://www.kaggle.com/c/accelerometer-biometric-competition
